description: Open-Responses GenAI Statistics for monitoring GenAI operations and interactions

options.content:
# Open-Responses GenAI Stats Dashboard

This dashboard provides comprehensive metrics for monitoring the GenAI operations and components of the Open-Responses platform. It includes client operations, token usage, creation/streaming operations, and built-in tool execution metrics.

**Application:** $application | **Namespace:** $namespace | **Instance:** $instance | **Time Range:** $__interval

panels.description: This panel displays the total count of successful GenAI requests.
This panel displays the breakdown of token usage by model

targets.expr: topk(5, sum by(gen_ai_request_model, gen_ai_response_model) (gen_ai_client_token_usage_sum{app="$application", instance="$namespace", exported_instance=~"$instance"}))

panels.title: Token Usage Model wise

targets.expr: sum by(gen_ai_request_model) (rate(gen_ai_client_operation_duration_seconds_sum{app="$application", instance="$namespace", exported_instance=~"$instance"}[$interval])) / sum by(gen_ai_request_model) (rate(gen_ai_client_operation_duration_seconds_count{app="$application", instance="$namespace", exported_instance=~"$instance"}[$interval]))

panels.description: This panel displays the breakdown of tool executions by tool type
panels.title: Built-in Tools Executions

panels.description: This panel displays the breakdown of GenAI operations by model
panels.title: Top 10 GenAI Operations by Model
Input Output Token Usage Over Time

panels.description: This panel displays the rate of built-in tool executions

panels.title: Tool Execution Rate by Tool Type

panels.description: Critical health metrics at a glance
panels.title: GenAI Health Overview

title: Open-Responses GenAI Stats
